message: I propose a fair 60/40 split. Let's get this over with quickly!
Your offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  I'm proposing a more reasonable split that recognizes the time value of this negotiation.
Let's meet in the middle this time.  I'm willing to give up some of my potential gain to reach a deal, but I need to make sure I get a reasonable share.  How about a 52/48 split?
